mapper.sql: ID, BATCH_ID, SURNAME, RF_ID, A0100, NAME, SEX, BIRTH_DATE, BIRTH_DATE_GB, IDNUMBER_GB, IDNUMBER_GA, REGISTE_RESIDENCE_CODE, REGISTE_RESIDENCE, WORK_UNIT, POST, POST_CODE, PERSON_MANAGER, IDENTITY_CODE, IDENTITY, SECRET_LEVEL, DECRYPT_STARTDATE, DECRYPT_ENDDATE, INBOUND_FLAG,SUCCESS,ERROR_MSG
mapper.select: select RF_ID from oms_reg_procbatch_person where BATCH_ID = #{batchId}
select count(1) from oms_reg_procbatch_person where CHECK_STATUS='0' and BATCH_ID=#{batchNo}
select count(1) from oms_reg_procbatch_person where BATCH_ID=#{batchNo} and RF_ID=#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_reg_procbatch_person (ID, BATCH_ID, SURNAME, RF_ID, A0100, NAME, SEX, BIRTH_DATE, BIRTH_DATE_GB, IDNUMBER_GB, IDNUMBER_GA, REGISTE_RESIDENCE_CODE, REGISTE_RESIDENCE, WORK_UNIT, POST, POST_CODE, PERSON_MANAGER, IDENTITY_CODE, IDENTITY, SECRET_LEVEL, DECRYPT_STARTDATE, DECRYPT_ENDDATE,INBOUND_FLAG ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.surname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.birthDateGb,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.idnumberGb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idnumberGa,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.registeResidenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.registeResidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.personManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.secretLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.decryptStartdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.decryptEnddate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.inboundFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.select: select ID, BATCH_ID, SURNAME, RF_ID, A0100, NAME, case when SEX='1' then '男' else '女' end as SEX, BIRTH_DATE, BIRTH_DATE_GB, IDNUMBER_GB, IDNUMBER_GA, REGISTE_RESIDENCE_CODE, REGISTE_RESIDENCE, WORK_UNIT, POST, POST_CODE, PERSON_MANAGER, IDENTITY_CODE, IDENTITY, SECRET_LEVEL, DECRYPT_STARTDATE, DECRYPT_ENDDATE, INBOUND_FLAG,SUCCESS,ERROR_MSG from oms_reg_procbatch_person where IFNULL(SUCCESS,'0')='0' and BATCH_ID=#{batchId}
